Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - SharePoint Online extends library permissions to downloaded files.
Description: This new capability ties together SharePoint Online library permissions with Purview sensitivity labeling and protection. SharePoint Online document library owners can set a label on the library, automatically applying that label to all unprotected and unlabeled Word, Excel, PowerPoint, and PDF files at rest in the target library.
